title: my google pixel 2xl is stuck has been stuck on the opening screen for over 24 hours
content: my phone ran out of battery so i turned it back on and started charging it... but it was stuck on the loading screen with the google logo. i have restarted it and nothing has changed, i tried running it out of battery and then leaving it to fully charge and it still is stuck on the loading screen. i tried holding down the volume and power buttons and still no difference.
